title: Derailed by ambition
selftext:
Modi focusing on personal PR by inaugrating every Vande Bharat while safety issues are ignored.
His inauguration is not the issue but considering he is the PM such events lead to a "All Hands On Deck" situation in the railways and everything else is put on hold and people working on important tasks ( like implementation of a collision safety system) are moved out to ensure the PMs PR stunt goes successfully. But are such PR stunts necessary when a tragic scenario lile the one that happend could have been averted if resources were focused on getting the safety related issues sorted first. 
This is not the first instance, in some of the initial runs of Vande Bharat there were incidents where the trains struck a cow and was visibly damaged. Despite that incident becoming a meme we should not forget that that was a serious near miss.
